titleStmt.title: Isham Hendersen to James F. Robinson
CWG7966

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
"Louisville Journal" Office
Louisville Ky
May 4th 1863
To his Excellency
Govr Jas F. Robinson
Frankfort Ky

Sir, Capt Jenkins the Post Quartermaster here has need for a notary Public in his office. He has asked me to apply for a commission for Mr W. C Averill, ^one of his^ clerks I hope you will find no objection to his appointment.

Jefferson Co
Notary
W. C. Averill
Com Issd May 5th 1863.
